name: asmh8300
summary: Hitachi H8S, H8/300 assemble language syntax
description: My work is writing firmware of H8 mpu now. So I need a better syntax file than old one. I try to improve the official syntax file. My improved one will highlight the keywords more correctly, and highlight the branch command , like "bhi, blo, ..." with different color.
install_details: just replace asmh8300.vim in "syntax" dir with my file.
